per_frame_1=wave_r = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(6*time);
per_frame_2=wave_g = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(4.1*time);
per_frame_3=wave_b = -1 + (1-wave_r + 1-wave_g);
per_frame_4=warp = 0;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=ob_r = 1-abs(wave_r);
per_frame_7=ob_b = 1-abs(wave_b);
per_frame_8=ob_g = 1-abs(wave_g);
per_pixel_1=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_2=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_3=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=
per_pixel_6=zoom = zoom + 0.05*sin(4-(4*cos(0.5-rad*cos(tan(14*dx_r*bass_att))*cos(1.12*time)*rad*
per_pixel_7=14*rad))*16*dx_r);
per_pixel_8=rot = rot + dx_r;
per_pixel_9=rot = rot + dy_r;
per_pixel_10=dx = dx + 0.1*dx_r;
per_pixel_11=dy = dy + 0.1*dy_r;

per_pixel_27=zoom=1;
per_pixel_28=cx=.5;
per_pixel_29=cy=.5;
per_pixel_30=warp=0;
per_pixel_31=
per_pixel_32=xb=((1-x)+(1-y))*(-(1-x)-(1-y)+2)/1.1;
per_pixel_33=xd=(x+y)-2+(x+y);
per_pixel_34=xd=sqrt(rad)-1;
per_pixel_35=//xd=abs(1-xd);
per_pixel_36=zoom=xd*xd+.796;
per_pixel_37=rot=rad/7533;
per_pixel_38=w=sin(rad*3 );
per_pixel_39=cc=w*w*w*w*w*w*w*w*w*w*w*w*sin(ang*12)/5 +1;
per_pixel_40=zoom=cc*zoom+0.01;
per_pixel_41=cr1=90*.01;
per_pixel_42=cr2=10*.01;
per_pixel_43=crx=cr2-cr1;
per_pixel_44=ci=rad;
per_pixel_45=cb=.25  ;
per_pixel_46=crs=2;
per_pixel_47=cr=pow(sin(ci*6.3-(cb*6.3))/2+.5,crs)*crx+cr1;
per_pixel_48=cqr=if( above (ci,.25+cb),cr,crx+cr1);crr=if( below(ci,1.5),cqr,crx+cr1);
per_pixel_49=jx1=crr;
per_pixel_50=kx1=1-crr;
per_pixel_51=
per_pixel_52=jdx=dx;
per_pixel_53=jdy=dy;
per_pixel_54=jsx=sx;
per_pixel_55=jsy=sy;
per_pixel_56=jrt=rot;
per_pixel_57=jzm=zoom;
per_pixel_58=jcx=cx;
per_pixel_59=jcy=cy;
per_pixel_60=jwp=warp;
per_pixel_61=
per_pixel_62=dx=(jx1*jdx+kx1*kdx);
per_pixel_63=dy=(jx1*jdy+kx1*kdy);
per_pixel_64=sx=(jx1*jsx+kx1*ksx);
per_pixel_65=sy=(jx1*jsy+kx1*ksy);
per_pixel_66=rot=(jx1*jrt+kx1*krt);
per_pixel_67=zoom=(jx1*jzm+kx1*kzm);
per_pixel_68=cx=(jx1*jcx+kx1*kcx);
per_pixel_69=cy=(jx1*jcy+kx1*kcy);
per_pixel_70=warp=(jx1*jwp+kx1*kwp);
